page.title: 20Blandford - Churches
page.content:
There are five Christian places of worship in the town:- The Parish Church of SS Peter & Paul { }The Methodist Church { }The United Reformed Church { }The Roman Catholic Church { }The Evangelical Church { {Topical issues in the town include: Twinning with Preetz & Mortain Redevelopment: St Leonards Chapel. Extension of Shorts Lane. Backing for an Annual Music Week. The Blandford Fly. Who pays for open space-Damory Down.
{Mrs Darke,Staff and children of {Archbishop Wake First School {acknowledge the kind co-operation of {everyone in the town during the {compilation of this Domesday Survey. }
